<title>Hammersmith Odeon, London ’75 | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="The audio companion to the DVD release of the legendary November 18, 1975 concert at the Hammersmith Odeon in London, England — the European concert debut of Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/hammersmith-odeon-london-75/" />

<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Hammersmith Odeon, London ’75" />
<meta property="og:description" content="The audio companion to the DVD release of the legendary November 18, 1975 concert at the Hammersmith Odeon in London, England — the European concert debut of Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band. This is the only full-length, official release of the early band live on stage and contains essential performances of many E Street classics." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/hammersmith-odeon-london-75/" />

This is the only full-length, official release of the early band live on stage and contains essential performances of many E Street classics." />

yoast_head_json.title: Hammersmith Odeon, London ’75 | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: The audio companion to the DVD release of the legendary November 18, 1975 concert at the Hammersmith Odeon in London, England — the European concert debut of Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band.
yoast_head_json.og_description: The audio companion to the DVD release of the legendary November 18, 1975 concert at the Hammersmith Odeon in London, England — the European concert debut of Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band. This is the only full-length, official release of the early band live on stage and contains essential performances of many E Street classics.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: The audio companion to the DVD release of the legendary November 18, 1975 concert at the Hammersmith Odeon in London, England — the European concert debut of Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band. This is the only full-length, official release of the early band live on stage and contains essential performances of many E Street classics.
